mapper.sql: id, name, sertId, sex, passWord, validatePwd, parentMobile, email, birthDay, imgUrl, createTime, motifyTime, isDel
mapper.insert: insert into ele_student (id, name, sertId, sex, passWord, validatePwd, parentMobile, email, birthYear,imgUrl, createTime, motifyTime, isDel ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validatePwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{motifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update ele_student
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sertId = #{sertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
passWord = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
validatePwd = #{validatePwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentMobile = #{parentMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthDay = #{birthDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
imgUrl = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
motifyTime = #{motifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isDel = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ele_student set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sertId = #{sertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, passWord = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, validatePwd = #{validatePwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentMobile = #{parentMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthDay = #{birthDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, imgUrl = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, motifyTime = #{motifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isDel = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select id, `name`, sertId, if(sex=1,'男','女') sex, passWord, validatePwd, parentMobile, email, birthDay, imgUrl, date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, date_format(motifyTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') motifyTime from ele_student where IsDel = 1
AND `name` like CONCAT('%', #{keywords},'%')
AND sertId like CONCAT('%', #{keywords},'%')
